amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds by the Director of the National Park Service to implement, administer, or enforce Policy Memorandum 11-03 or to approve a request by a park superintendent to eliminate the sale in National Parks of water in disposable plastic bottles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by the Director of the National Park Service to implement, administer, or enforce Policy Memorandum 11-03 or to approve a request by a park superintendent to eliminate the sale in National Parks of water in disposable plastic bottles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A087) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rothfus amendment (A087) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A087) offered by Mr. Rothfus.
